name: Subnet Nmap Scan Host Discovery
description: This ability will perform a subnet Nmap scan to discover hosts on the network.

executors.name: sh
executors.command: ip=#{host.ip.address} && sub=$(echo "$ip" | awk -F. '{print $1"."$2"."$3".0/24"}') && (command -v nmap >/dev/null 2>&1 || (apt update && apt install -y nmap)) && nmap -sn --min-rate 5000 $sub
